docs.lead_paragraph: Some traveler who has roamed in lands across the water, has told us that the valley which is mirrered in the crystal Passaic, is the only one in America which reminds him of Italy. In Italy I have never boon, but if there is anything beneath her sunny skies as beautiful as this landscape upon which my eye now rests, her reputation has not been unjustly acquired.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Sacrament. On Sunday last at the German Roman Catholic Church, Montrose-avenue, Brooklyn, the first Communion was administered to one hundred and ten children. The girls were dressed in white, and the boys in black with white gloves. The Brooklyn Board of Health yesterday adopted a resolution prohibiting slaughter houses in the first six and Thirteenth Wards. ds. Mr. W. R.

docs.lead_paragraph: Brooklyn Board of Health. This Board was organized on Friday morning Present, Mayor HALL, Aldermen Barnard, Huntley, Crowell, Walsh, Bennett. Mayor HALL was chosen Chairman. The following Health Wardens were appointed: First District--Aaron L. West; Second District--John Patterson; Fourth District-J. K. Oake; Fifth District--P. S. Jacobs. .

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; PRESENTATION TO JAMES W. BARKER Supper and Speeches. The Hospital for Women. Frightful Suicide with a Pistol-Disappointment in Love. Life and Its Relations. Mayer's Office--Charge of False Pretences. The Census Marshals. Forged "Fifties" on the Chatham Bank. Supposed Murder by Poison. Fire in Twenty-sixth-street. City Mortality. docs.lead_paragraph: On Saturday evening delegations from the various K. N. lodges, with personal friends of JAMES W. BARKER, Esq., attended at the Collamore House for the purpose of presenting to him a valuable set of plate, consisting of 105 pieces. es.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE LIFE OF GEORGE WASHINGTON. By WASHINGTON IRVING. IN three volumes. Vol. 1, pp. 504 New-York, G. P. PUTNAM. The patriarch of American literature, after half a century of honorable labor, fitly closed his brilliant and useful career by becoming the biographer of WASHINGTON, who so eminently deserved the title. (greater than that of Emperor, King, or Kaisir,) of "Father of his Country."

headline.main: HAVANA.; Arrival of the Black Warrior--Three Days Later from Havana.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. steamer Black Warrior, J. D. BULLOCK, Commander, from New-Orleans via Havana, arrived on Saturday. The Black Warrior left Havana on 28th. There was nothing of particular importance at that place.
docs.snippet: The U.S. steamer Black Warrior, J. D. BULLOCK, Commander, from New-Orleans via Havana, arrived on Saturday. The Black Warrior left Havana on 28th. There was nothing of particular importance at that place.

docs.lead_paragraph: The rigid character of our Sunday laws, and the determination which Mayor WOOD has manifested to have them strictly enforced, render it a very important question to many thousands of the denizens of our streets, and to a great multitude of strangers among us, who have no hones of their own, how they are to quench their thirst on Sunday. he
